attributes.additional_details: It has been a great anoyance for years queing in hours of traffic to get to the other side. paying to go through the tolls is not what annoys me the most what annoys me is the fact that we are trying to be green and have low emittions this is not going to happen with the dartford crossing it may earn millions of pounds each day but when are we going to realise this global warming because its a growing problem dont we want to show off to the rest of the world that were green. please remove the tolls no one wants them there
